title: Please help me ID this sans serif / 'cbm office automation'
content:
Hi everyone,

I feel I should immediately recognize this typeface but I just can't seem to do it.

Check out the link: [http://www.cbm.ab.ca/images/map\_info.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022081956/http:/www.cbm.ab.ca/images/map_info.jpg "http://www.cbm.ab.ca/images/map\_info.jpg")
author: MrDlandreth

comments.content: it looks like Gill Sans but the "c" doesn't match.
Reminds me of [Flexy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022081956/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/flexy/fonts/) or Dax, though it's not either of them. Definitely not Gill Sans.
